n=int(input())
def sum(n):
    i = 1
    s = 0.0
    for i in range(1, n+1):
        s = s + 1/i
    return s

print(sum(n))

    ans += (1 / i)

#!/usr/bin/env python3
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**8)
input = sys.stdin.readline
 
n = int(input())
ans = 0
for i in range(n, 0, -1):
    ans += 1 / i
print(ans)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    
    ans = 0
    
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        ans += 1/i
    
    print(ans)
    

main()
